author: carwow
description:
Get 20% off Car Vertical using code Carwow: https://bit.ly/Carwow-Car-Vertical

It’s time for a hot hatch 1/4-mile drag race between a Ford Fiesta ST, VW Polo GTI, MINI JCW, Alpine A290, and an Abarth 600e! 

These petrol and electric pocket rockets all come in at under £40,000, but which will be quickest over the quarter mile? Let’s take a closer look at the stats… 

The Ford Fiesta ST is powered by 1.5 turbocharged 3-cylinder 200hp and 320Nm. This power is sent to the front wheels only via a 6-speed manual gearbox, and it’s the lightest car here, at 1,283kg. When new, it costs around £27,000. 

Alongside it is the Volkswagen Polo GTI. It’s packing a 2-litre turbocharged 4-cylinder, and this puts down 207hp and 320Nm. It’s equipped with a 7-speed automatic gearbox which sends power to the front wheels, and it tips the scales at 1,296kg. It costs just over £31,000.

Up next is the MINI Cooper JCW. Like the Polo, it also has a 2-litre 4-cylinder turbo, and it produces 231hp and 380Nm.
title: Ultimate HOT HATCH DRAG RACE: Ford v VW v MINI v Alpine v Abarth
